document.full_text: daniel sedin scored twice and roberto luongo made 39 saves as vancouver built a 10-point lead over second-place detroit with eight games left in the regular season.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: in a battle of the west's best, vancouver defeats detroit
lines_and_colors: daniel sedin scored twice and roberto luongo made 39 saves as vancouver built a 10-point lead over second-place detroit with eight games left in the regular season.
